title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running LLMs locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python library.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs & embedders.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli-copilot
summary: Terminal copilot that uses Ollama to suggest shell commands and explain stderr messages.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store; ready-to-run notebook.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions via Ollama; slash commands, streaming replies.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; supports chat, generate, pull, list, and embeddings with async wrappers.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators & embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-copilot-vscode
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama completions, inline chat, and explain-code features.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official curated Modelfiles for Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, Phi, etc.; ready to pull via CLI.

title: ollama-gui-react
summary: Lightweight React chat interface consuming Ollama REST API; no backend needed.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama with async streaming and DI-friendly interfaces.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI autocomplete & summarization powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot using Bolt JS and Ollama to answer DMs and channel mentions with streaming support.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot-streamlit
summary: Streamlit demo app implementing a RAG chatbot backed by Ollama embeddings and Llama 3.
